name: Personal Space Station
description:
A four player couch co-op game where you try to keep the station alive as long as possible. There are multiple layers of work stations and interactions that you need to handle in order to keep the station alive.

This is the second project at Yrgo where the classes Game Programming, Computer Graphics and Digital Design collaborated to create games.

We were a total of eighteen people working together for four weeks to create Personal Space Station.

Mission Statement:

  • The creature known as "Flurp" must survive.
  • Keep the ship's workstations up and running. Without them, you will not make it.
  • Remember to log your research at the other workstations. You must do so to proceed.
